# title

**Instance Property**

The title displayed on the bar button.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Setting this property has an effect only when the button type is [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPBarButton/Type/text].

## Configuring the Button

- **isEnabled**: A Boolean value that enables and disables the bar button.
- **image**: The image displayed on the bar button.
